attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty, we have had enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It costs the taxpayer some £35,000 a year to keep a murderer and £75,000 a year to keep the likes of Brady and other mass murderers (they, I believe, have a semi-penthouse type accommodation, with lounge, separate bedroom and their own shower room plus made-to-measure meals).

We now need to show the world we in the UK will not tolerate murder and anyone commiting it will forfeit their life by execution, come what may.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
